title: Olive’s Famous Brownies
sub_head: At Olive + Gourmando in Montreal—featured in episode one of ‘Field Guide to Eating in Canada’— they bake these espresso brownies and then cool them overnight in the fridge to create a fudge-like interior. If you want that classic brownie crumb, then skip this step—just don’t skip anything else.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
